name: Mewtwo

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: Barrier
attacks.text: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Mewtwo in order to prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Mewtwo during your opponent's next turn.

flavorText: A scientist created this Pokemon after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

strengths: Effective against Rain Dance and other energy-heavy decks
weaknesses: Weak against opponents with minimal energy

competitiveHistory: Mewtwo was valued as a tech card against energy-heavy decks like Rain Dance. Its Psychic attack could deal massive damage to Pokemon loaded with energy, making it an effective meta counter. The Psychic weakness to itself made Mewtwo mirrors particularly volatile.

rulings.ruling: Psychic counts all Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokemon, including Special Energy like Double Colorless Energy (counts as 1 card, not 2 energy).
Barrier must have the Psychic Energy discarded as a cost. If no Psychic Energy is attached, Barrier cannot be used.
